unnormalised: Arrey yaar, this whole copyright thing is a bigger headache than figuring out GST! My friend Suresh created this awesome meme, right? Posted it on Insta. Now some big company is using it for their ad! Adv. Sharma says we can sue, but filing a case seems like more work than actually coming up with the meme. Intellectual property, more like intellectual *poverty* after all the lawyer fees, hai na? Maybe he should just ask for â‚¹5000 and a lifetime supply of samosas instead. What to do, boss?
normalised: Arrey yaar, this whole copyright thing is a bigger headache than figuring out G-S-T! My friend Suresh created this awesome meme, right? Posted it on Insta. Now some big company is using it for their ad! Advocate Sharma says we can sue, but filing a case seems like more work than actually coming up with the meme. Intellectual property, more like intellectual poverty after all the lawyer fees, hai na? Maybe he should just ask for rupee five thousand and a lifetime supply of samosas instead. What to do, boss?
